companies.name: Perplexity AI
companies.reason: Perplexity AI is a rapidly growing artificial intelligence startup specializing in conversational AI and search augmentation technologies. It has gained significant attention this year as AI conversational tools continue to explode in demand, fueling interest from both consumers and enterprises. Their platform leverages large language models to provide enhanced AI-powered search experiences.

companies.name: Cohere
companies.reason: Cohere focuses on providing advanced natural language processing models and infrastructure to businesses for AI integration. Recently, it has attracted buzz due to its collaborations with leading AI development firms and the increasing deployment of NLP in practical business workflows and products.

companies.name: Supabase
companies.reason: Supabase offers an open-source backend-as-a-service platform enabling developers to build scalable applications faster. It is trending due to its rapid adoption in the developer community as a Firebase alternative, particularly for startup and mid-size tech companies seeking efficient database and authentication solutions.
